page.description: This section contains the 'ControlBar properties' property which opens the ControlBar Builder. This builder allows you to define a ControlBar. The other properties in this section manipulate a defined ControlBar control in relation to the other controls on a UX.

section.description: See the [ControlBar guides] section on the documentation for more information on implementing ControlBar controls in a UX component.
